name: Enviro-Kleen 1100
description: Enviro-Kleen 1100 is a heavy duty chlorinated cage and bottle washing compound designed specifically for re-circulating and batch washers. In addition to a being powerful cleaner that can handle the toughest jobs, Enviro-Kleen 1100 is also free from polluting phosphates, and are not risks for biological persistance or bioaccumulation. All components of the cleaners are biodegradable and break down harmlessly, so that you can clean your facility without worrying about your environmental impact.
